title: A overview on VSC4T theme Markdown element
content: 本文将展示VSC4T主题支持的所有Markdown元素及其渲染效果。 块级元素 (Block Elements)段落和换行 (Paragraphs and Line Breaks)这是一个段落。这行会和上一行连在一起。 这是第二个段落。这行后面加了两个空格，所以会换行显示。 标题 (Headers)一级标题二级标题三级标题四级标题五级标题六级标题引用块 (Blockquotes) 这是一个引用块继续引用 这是引用块的新段落 列表 (Lists)无序列表： 红色 绿色 蓝色 有序列表： 第一项 第二项 第三项 代码块 (Code Blocks)普通代码块： 语法高亮代码块： 表格 (Tables) 左对齐 居中对齐 右对齐 单元格11 单元格12 单元格13 单元格21 单元格22 单元格23 分隔线 (Horizontal Rules) 行内元素 (Inline Elements)链接 (Links)这是一个链接http://example.com 强调 (Emphasis)斜体文本 斜体文本粗体文本 粗体文本粗斜体文本 粗斜体文本 代码 (Code)使用console.log()函数打印信息。 图片 (Images) 其他元素 (Miscellaneous)删除线 (Strikethrough)这是删除线文本 自动链接 (Automatic Links)http://example.comaddress@example.com 转义字符 (Backslash Escapes)*这不是斜体* 内联HTML (Inline HTML)这是红色文本 LaTeX公式 (Math Equations)行内公式：$E = mc^2$ 行间公式：$$\frac{d}{dx}\left( \int_{0}^{x} f(u),du\right)=f(x)$$ 多行公式：\begin{align*}y &= x^2 \y’ &= 2x \\int y,dx &= \frac{x^3}{3} + C\end{align*} SVG图形 (SVG Graphics) SVG Text Example

title: VSC4T - A Dark and Elegant Hexo Theme
content: VSCat Hexo ThemeAn elegant and minimalist Hexo theme featuring dark color scheme and code-style design aesthetics. Features 🌙 Dark mode optimized 📱 Fully responsive layout 🚀 Fast loading performance 🎨 Clean minimalist design Installation Navigate to your Hexo site’s themes directory: Clone this repository: Set the theme in your site configuration: Required ConfigurationEnable Relative LinksFor proper theme deployment, set in your Hexo site’s _config.yml: The theme may not work correctly without relative links enabled. Create Required PagesThis theme requires the following pages: Create categories page: Then edit source/categories/index.md and add Create tags page: Then edit source/tags/index.md and add Create about page: And add personal information in source/about/index.md Theme ConfigurationModify _config.yml in the theme directory: Language ConfigurationVSC4T theme supports multiple languages. To change the language, modify your site’s _config.yml: Supported Languages English (en) Simplified Chinese (zh-CN) Japanese (ja) Korean (ko) French (fr) German (de) Spanish (es) Italian (it) Russian (ru) Portuguese (pt) Arabic (ar) Vietnamese (vi) Language Configuration ExamplesTo use other languages, set the language parameter in your site’s _config.yml: You can also configure multiple languages: When multiple languages are configured, the first one will be the default. Post SettingsCreating New Posts Use Hexo command to create a new post: This will create a new markdown file at source/_posts/post-title.md Example post: Custom StylesThe theme supports custom CSS and JS. In theme configuration: Mobile OptimizationThe theme is optimized for mobile devices. You can adjust mobile settings in theme configuration: Code HighlightingThis theme uses built-in code highlighting by default. You can adjust it with: LicenseThis theme is released under the MIT License. SupportFor any issues or help needed, please submit an issue on the GitHub repository. Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.
